Chivas Insider

URL:

Chivas Insider

Agency:

Pixel Bottom

Challenge:

To build a international website for the Chivas Regal brand. The website was for employess of Chivas and was to help promote the brand to a younger audience and show how Chivas could work with influencers around the world. It needed to be an employee only website.

Solution:

I worked closely again with the designer to get the animation to work well with the look and feel of the website. I was able to create the password protection by using the default WordPress users functionality and just styling it to my needs.

To get the magazine look and feel, we did eventually go with a unique theme that the client selected, this was a very basic theme but it had the required magazine style functionality that the client was looking for.

Features:

  • ->  Password protected
  • ->  WordPress
  • ->  Magazine look and feel
  • ->  Responsive
  • ->  Extensive animation

Technology:

WordPress, HTML, SASS, JavsScript, Node.js, Gulp,
